title: Law School Deans to Discuss Their Support for Supreme Court Nominee Elena Kagan | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 15, 2010

 



Law School Deans to Discuss Their Support for Supreme Court Nominee Elena Kagan




WASHINGTON – Today at 4:15pm EDT, Martha Minow, Dean and Jeremiah Smith, Jr. Professor of Law at the Harvard Law School; Evan H. Caminker, Dean and Branch Rickey Collegiate Professor of Law at the University of Michigan Law School; and Joseph D. Kearney, Dean and Professor of Law, Marquette University Law School, will hold a conference call to discuss their support for Elena Kagan’s nomination to the Supreme Court. 
Click here to read a letter signed by law school Deans across the country who back Kagan’s nomination.

WHO:    Martha Minow, Dean and Jeremiah Smith, Jr. Professor of Law at the Harvard Law School
             
             Evan H. Caminker, Dean and Branch Rickey Collegiate Professor of Law at the University of Michigan Law School
            
             Joseph D. Kearney, Dean and Professor of Law, Marquette University Law School
WHAT:  Conference Call with Law School Deans to Discuss Elena Kagan’s Supreme Court Nomination
WHEN: Tuesday, June 15
            4:15pm EDT
HOW:   Reporters wishing to join this call should dial (877) 941-8641.
